    • Method Detail

      • getKey

        public String getKey()
        Get the theme's key. This is the name assigned in the webapp configuration.
        Returns:
        the key

      • getChain

        public final Iterable<Theme> getChain()
        Return the inheritance chain of themes, from leaf to root. The first element is guaranteed to be this object. Each element is followed by its parent until a root theme is reached.
        Returns:
        the chain of themes

      • getTemplateLoader

        public abstract freemarker.cache.TemplateLoader getTemplateLoader()
                                                           throws IOException
        Return a loader for this theme's templates.
        Returns:
        the loader
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs accessing the template files

      • getStaticResource

        public final InputStream getStaticResource(String path)
                                    throws IOException
        Open a stream to a static resource defined in this theme or the nearest possible parent. Return null if the resource is not available at all.

        It is the caller's responsibility to close the returned stream.

        Parameters:
        path - the path to the static resource
        Returns:
        the stream to a static resource
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs accessing the resource

      • fetchStaticResource

        protected abstract InputStream fetchStaticResource(String path)
                                            throws IOException
        Open a stream to a static resource, or return null if that resource is not defined in this theme. A return value of null indicates that the resource may still be defined in this theme's parent, so the caller should look there next.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the static resource
        Returns:
        a stream to a static resource, or return null if that resource is not defined in this theme
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs accessing the resource

      • getResourceAttributes

        public Theme.ResourceAttributes getResourceAttributes(String path)
                                               throws IOException
        Returns the last modified time and the content length for a given resource returned by this theme.
        Parameters:
        path - the static resource path
        Returns:
        see Theme.ResourceAttributes
        Throws:
        IOException

      • fetchResourceAttributes

        protected abstract Theme.ResourceAttributes fetchResourceAttributes(String path)
                                                             throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getStaticResourcePaths

        public final com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<String> getStaticResourcePaths(String root)
                                                                            throws IOException
        Return a collection of all static resources available from a root path in this theme and its parents. The returned paths are relative to the provided root, and should be concatenated to it before passing to getStaticResource(java.lang.String). (See the method body of dumpToTemporaryDirectory(java.lang.String) for an example usage.)
        Parameters:
        root - the root path
        Returns:
        the static resource paths
        Throws:
        IOException

      • fetchStaticResourcePaths

        protected abstract Collection<String> fetchStaticResourcePaths(String root)
                                                        throws IOException
        Return a collection of all static resources available from a root path in this theme. Return values must follow the same contract as in getStaticResourcePaths(java.lang.String).
        Parameters:
        root - the root path
        Returns:
        the static resource paths
        Throws:
        IOException

      • dumpToTemporaryDirectory

        public final File dumpToTemporaryDirectory(String root)
                                    throws IOException
        Dump all static resources in this theme and its parents into a single temporary directory.
        Returns:
        the new temporary directory
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getConfigMap

        public final Map<String,Object> getConfigMap(String path)
                                      throws IOException
        Read a set of configuration values from YAML (or JSON), overriding individual values from parent themes if applicable. The path (plus a *.yaml or *.json extension) points to a file containing an object (i.e., key-value map) in the special config/ theme path.

        This is distinct from the other kinds of theme inheritance (getTemplateLoader() and getStaticResource(java.lang.String)), which override on a file-by-file basis. This method reads a map (if any) at the given path from every theme in the inheritance chain, and builds the result map by overriding individual members.

        Parameters:
        path - a path within the theme's config/ directory
        Returns:
        a map of overridden values
        Throws:
        IOException
